short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FastValidate is a validation service to validate contact information including email, phone and address validation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FastValidate is a validation service for individuals or businesses wishing to validate contact information including email, phone, address and vat number validation. Use this extension to get started validating your contact information quickly and try our services for free! Once you have added your API key this extension allows quick validation of contact information at any time and shows your remaining request balance in the app icon making it super easy to track your usage!
